about_the_game:
We all love the original color crew. But it’s time to spice things up… by bringing you 4 new options for playable characters.

Sawyer may be your choice if you’re more of an introvert who enjoys a little peace and quiet.

Abdu is chill AF and may be the perfect choice if you just want to go with the flow.

Susanne brings a loud, electrifying personality that lets you go full badass.

And Noodles… Noodles is just Noodles. Pure unadulterated derp energy.

Now you will have more ways to answer the age-old question: WHO ARE YOU?

content_descriptors.notes: Use of mature language in a humorous way.

We all love the original color crew. But it’s time to spice things up… by bringing you 4 new options for playable characters.

Sawyer may be your choice if you’re more of an introvert who enjoys a little peace and quiet.

Abdu is chill AF and may be the perfect choice if you just want to go with the flow.

Susanne brings a loud, electrifying personality that lets you go full badass.

And Noodles… Noodles is just Noodles. Pure unadulterated derp energy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or anything that makes sense
  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
